text: Tetris DX is a video game released in 1998 for the Game Boy Color console. It is a remake of the Game Boy game Tetris. The game can save high scores, has two new modes, new music themes, and three profiles for three separate players. In "Ultra Mode", players must collect as many points as possible in three minutes. In "40 Lines", players must clear 40 lines as quickly as possible. Category:1998 video games Category:Game Boy Color games en:Tetris (Game Boy)#Tetris DX
title: Tetris DX
